title: simina.andreea
author: simina.andreea
content: Hi there,This is a simple job that can be completed in under 10 minutes. Job steps:Selected candidates will need to set up an account on a specific platform (gaming-related). Upon account verification (simple email confirmation - no personal details necessary), candidates will need to perform 2 simple actions on the platform;Candidates will receive an email confirmation once the actions are performed. They need to provide a screenshot of that confirmation to us.Candidates get paid upon providing the confirmation.Payment is $1 for each completed task.A candidate may complete multiple tasks, as long as they can demonstrate successful completion (VPN can be used).Detailed instructions on the requirements will be provided to selected candidates.We need between 750-1000 tasks competed.Candidate requirements:Must have basic English skills to understand the instructions provided.Must have a non-disposable email address for setting up the account (gmail, yahoo, outlook are all ok);Must be able to use a VPN to complete the task (Opera’s built-in VPN is a simple solution that works, but we’re open to alternatives as well);That’s it!
